item.description:
@junkj wrote:

instead of send keys vb delete of all of them put

sendkeys(‘soahrfhdkfj’) + Chr(13))

That should help a little

item.title: Merry Xmas Talker
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

I thought of making something original and amusing, it’s a christmas talker, and it probably gets you banned fast (SendKeys)… funny to use in w1 on a lvl 3 account…

[CODE]program ChristmasTalker;
procedure Talk;
begin
SendKeys(‘Merry christmas!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(10000);
SendKeys(‘Ho Ho Ho!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(5000);
SendKeys(‘What you doing here?’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(500);
SendKeys(‘Its christmas evening!!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(10000);
SendKeys(‘Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas’);
writeln(‘Christmas by System79’);
end;

begin
Talk;
end.[/CODE]

Read full topic
